id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Set the ID of this sensor.



*See also: [cap1188 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/cap1188.html#configuration-variables)*

reset_pin.docs:
**[Pin](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin)**: Set the pin that is used to reset the CAP1188 board on boot.



*See also: [cap1188 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/cap1188.html#configuration-variables)*

touch_threshold.docs:
**int**: The touch threshold for all channels. This defines the sensitivity for touch detection.
  * `0x01`: Maximum sensitivity - Most sensitive to touch
  
  * `0x20`: Default sensitivity
  
  * `0x40`: Medium sensitivity (I used this sensitivity when being used through a 3mm sheet of plastic)
  
  * `0x80`: Minimum sensitivity - Least sensitive to touch
  
  



*See also: [cap1188 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/cap1188.html#configuration-variables)*

allow_multiple_touches.docs:
**boolean**: Whether to allow multitouch. Defaults to off.



*See also: [cap1188 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/cap1188.html#configuration-variables)*

address.docs:
**int**: The I²C address of the sensor. Defaults to `0x29`.



*See also: [cap1188 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/cap1188.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.



*See also: [cap1188 Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/cap1188.html#binary-sensor)*

cap1188_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The ID of the CAP1188 defined above. Useful for multiple CAP1188’s on the I²C bus.



*See also: [cap1188 Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/cap1188.html#binary-sensor)*

channel.docs:
**int**: The channel number the CAP1188 the touchkey is connected to.



*See also: [cap1188 Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/cap1188.html#binary-sensor)*
